mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NM FROM TB_BOARD WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId} AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT TP.POST_ID , TP.USER_ID , TU.USER_NM , TP.POST_TTL , TP.POST_CNT , TP.RGST_DT , TP.UPDT_DT FROM TB_POST TP INNER JOIN TB_USER TU ON (TP.USER_ID = TU.USER_ID) WHERE TP.POST_ID = #{postId} AND TP.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY RGST_DT DESC
